Source.Name: clicompanion
Source.Summary: CLI Companion is a Terminal that lets you store commands and create a 'command dictionary.'
Source.Description: CLI Companion is a tool to store and run Terminal commands from a GUI. People unfamiliar with the Terminal will find CLI Companion a useful way to become acquainted with the Terminal and unlock its potential. Experienced users can use CLI Companion to store their extensive list of commands in a searchable list.
